00020 require 'simbio_form_maker.inc.php';
00021 
00031 class simbio_form_table extends simbio_form_maker
00032 {
00033     public $table_attr;
00034     public $table_header_attr;
00035     public $table_content_attr;
00036     public $submit_button_attr = 'name="submit" value="Save Data"';
00037     public $with_form_tag = true;
00038     public $edit_mode = false;
00039     public $record_id = false;
00040     public $record_title = 'RECORD';
00041     // back button
00042     public $back_button = true;
00043     public $delete_button = true;
00044 
00053     public function __construct($str_form_name, $str_form_action, $str_form_method = 'post', $bool_enable_upload = true)
00054     {
00055         // execute parent constructor
00056         parent::__construct($str_form_name, $str_form_action, $str_form_method, $bool_enable_upload);
00057     }
00058 
00059 
00065     public function printOut()
00066     {
00067         // create table object
00068         $_table = new simbio_table();
00069         // set the table attr
00070         $_table->table_attr = $this->table_attr;
00071 
00072         $_buffer = '';
00073         // check if form tag is included
00074         if ($this->with_form_tag) {
00075             $_buffer .= $this->startForm()."\n";
00076         }
00077 
00078         // loop the form element
00079         $_row_num = 0;
00080         foreach ($this->elements as $row) {
00081            $_form_element = $row['element']->out();
00082            if ($_form_element_info = trim($row['info'])) {
00083                $_form_element .= '<div class="formElementInfo">'.$_form_element_info.'</div>';
00084            }
00085            // append row
00086            $_table->appendTableRow(array($row['label'], ':', $_form_element));
00087            // set the column header attr
00088            $_table->setCellAttr($_row_num+1, 0, 'width="20%" valign="top"'.$this->table_header_attr);
00089            $_table->setCellAttr($_row_num+1, 1, 'width="1%" valign="top"'.$this->table_header_attr);
00090            // set the form element column attr
00091            $_table->setCellAttr($_row_num+1, 2, 'width="79%" '.$this->table_content_attr);
00092            $_row_num++;
00093         }
00094 
00095         // link and buttons
00096         $_edit_link = '';
00097         $_delete_button = '';
00098         $_back_button = '';
00099 
00100     $_del_value = __('Delete Record');
00101         $_cancel_value = __('Cancel');
00102 
00103         // check if we are on edit form mode
00104         if ($this->edit_mode) {
00105             $_edit_link .= '<a href="#" onclick="enableForm(\''.$this->form_name.'\', event); enableForm(\'deleteForm\', event);" style="font-weight: bold;" class="editFormLink">EDIT</a>';
00106             // delete button exists if the record_id exists
00107             if ($this->record_id && $this->delete_button) {
00108                 $_delete_button = '<input type="button" value="'.$_del_value.'" class="button" onclick="confSubmit(\'deleteForm\', \'Are you sure to delete '.addslashes($this->record_title).'?\nOnce Deleted it cant be restored again\')" style="color: red; font-weight: bold;" />';
00109             }
00110             // back button
00111             if ($this->back_button) {
00112                 $_back_button = '<input type="button" class="cancelButton button" value="'.$_cancel_value.'" onclick="javascript: self.history.back();" />';
00113             }
00114         }
00115 
00116         $_buttons = '';
00117         if ($this->with_form_tag) {
00118             $_buttons = '<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" style="width: 100%; background-color: #dcdcdc;">'
00119                 .'<tr><td><input type="submit" '.$this->submit_button_attr.' /> '.$_delete_button.' '.$_back_button.'</td><td align="right">'.$_edit_link.'</td>'
00120                 .'</tr></table>'."\n";
00121         }
00122         // get the table result
00123         $_buffer .= $_buttons;
00124         $_buffer .= $_table->printTable();
00125         $_buffer .= $_buttons;
00126 
00127         // extract all hidden elements here
00128         foreach ($this->hidden_elements as $_hidden) {
00129             $_buffer .= $_hidden->out();
00130         }
00131         // update ID hidden elements
00132         if ($this->edit_mode AND $this->record_id) {
00133             // add hidden form element flag for detail editing purpose
00134             $_buffer .= '<input type="hidden" name="updateRecordID" value="'.$this->record_id.'" />';
00135         }
00136 
00137         // check if form tag is included
00138         if ($this->with_form_tag) {
00139             $_buffer .= $this->endForm()."\n";
00140         }
00141 
00142         if ($this->edit_mode) {
00143             // hidden form for deleting records
00144             $_buffer .= '<form action="'.$this->form_action.'" id="deleteForm" method="post" style="display: inline;"><input type="hidden" name="itemID" value="'.$this->record_id.'" /><input type="hidden" name="itemAction" value="true" /></form>';
00145             // disabling form
00146             $_buffer .= '<script type="text/javascript">disableForm(\''.$this->form_name.'\');disableForm(\'deleteForm\');</script>';
00147         }
00148         // output
00149         return $_buffer;
00150     }
00151 }
